name: Shuttle Hell
description:
This is a bullet hell without movement. You are escaping from a space prison and shoot move the enemies. Good luck!

The goal is score.  When the bar is not full, you gain 60 points per second. When the bar is full, you get 3 times more!

Using the laser will empty the bar a bit. When full, you also have access to a powerful blue laser, that gives a huge number of points when used on a large group of enemy.

I first wanted to make the world move, not the player. But that is almost the same thing. So I improvised.

I soon realized it was too easy to just spam the lasers to never get killed. That is why I added the score system. The game rewards you for not shooting. That is even more obvious when the energy bar is full!
